
N = 22
d = pi/N
!! f(x) = - cos x


nodes = ARRAY [ 0 <= i <= N ]   ( f ( i * d )  )
calc nodes 


(-1, -0.9898214418809327, -0.9594929736144974, -0.9096319953545184, -0.8412535328311812, -0.7557495743542583, -0.6548607339452851, -0.5406408174555977, -0.41541501300188644, -0.2817325568414298, -0.14231483827328512, -6.123233995736766E-17, 0.142314838273285, 0.28173255684142967, 0.4154150130018863, 0.5406408174555977, 0.654860733945285, 0.7557495743542582, 0.8412535328311811, 0.9096319953545184, 0.9594929736144974, 0.9898214418809327, 1)
graph LIM 50 [ 0 <= i <= N  ] (  T9 ( nodes#i ), T10 ( nodes#i ),  T11 ( nodes#i ),  T12 x, T13  ( nodes#i )   )


!! eval (T) = ARRAY [ 0 <= i <= N ]   ( @|T ( nodes#i )  )


t = { x } -> { T10 (x) }
